widget.name: Media Player
widget.description: A Media Player using ArtPlayer.js library to stream .mp4, .ogg,.webm and Hls(.m3u8)

property.caption: Source URL
property.description: The URL of the video you want to play. Only direct links to media files are accepted e.g. .mp4 and .m3u8

property.caption: Poster Source URL
property.description: A URL of an image that is used as a background of the player. The poster effect can only be seen before the video is played

property.caption: Player Theme
property.description: Sets the theme of the player. Uses hex color codes

property.caption: Pause Logo
property.description: The logo that is shown in the pause state of the player

property.caption: Loading Animation
property.description: The animation that is shown when the player is loading

property.caption: Loading Animation Width
property.description: Width in pixels of the loading animation

property.caption: Loading Animation Height
property.description: Height in pixels of the loading Animation
